A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 23, 2010'''. This was the final version of the Indev phase of development.<ref>[[wordofnotch:407142251|Indev update, on to infinite!]] – The Word of Notch, February 23, 2010</ref><ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5_G6O5JWn0</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cobblestone JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cobblestone]]'''
* Can now be smelted into [[stone]].

'''[[File:Oak Log (UD) JE2.png|32px]] [[Log]]'''
* Now drops itself instead of [[planks]] when {{control|broken}}.

'''[[File:Oak Planks JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Planks]]'''
* Now crafted with [[log]].
{{Crafting table
|B2=Oak Log
|Output=Oak Planks, 4}}

'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Improved performance.

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Chainmail Armor JE1 BE1.png; Diamond Armor JE1 BE1.png; Golden Armor JE1 BE1.png; Iron Armor JE1 BE1.png; Leather Armor JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Armor]]'''
* Can no longer be stacked.

'''[[File:Bread JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bread]]'''
* Now crafted with 3 [[wheat]] instead of 6.
{{Crafting table
|A3=Wheat
|C3=Wheat
|B3=Wheat
|Output=Bread}}

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
* Sheep only drop light gray cloth when punched.
